commit.message: [SYNCOPE-827] provides filters management for push tasks

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@ + + + + + + +
+ + + +

@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@

+filters=Filter about ${key}
+On=AND
+Off=OR

@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one

+On=AND
+Off=OR
+filters=Filtro per ${key}
